Package edu.byu.rpg.systems

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DestroySystem
    This system removes any entities from RpgGame.engine which are flagged for removal.
    DrawSystem
    This class hasn't been implemented yet...
    Mappers
    This is a class full of static ComponentMapper instances for use within our game engine systems.
    UpdateSystem
    This system handles the game's core engine loop.
